original_text: ‘Three months before your food was ready to pick, I did not send rain. So all the food became too dry. Sometimes I sent rain to one city, but I did not send it to other cities. I sent rain to one person's land, but I did not send it to another person's land. So that other person's land became too dry.
korean_text: 또 추수하기 석 달 전에 내가 너희에게 비를 멈추게 하여 어떤 성읍에는 내리고 어떤 성읍에는 내리지 않게 하였더니 땅 한 부분은 비를 얻고 한 부분은 비를 얻지 못하여 말랐으매

sentences.original_text: Three months before your food was ready to pick
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 곡식이 거둘 준비가 되기 3개월 전에

sentences.original_text: So all the food became too dry
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 모든 곡식이 너무 마르게 되었다

sentences.original_text: Sometimes I sent rain to one city
sentences.korean_translation: 때때로 내는 한 도시에 비를 보냈다

sentences.original_text: but I did not send it to other cities
I sent rain to one person's land
but I did not send it to another person's land
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 사람의 땅에는 보내지 않았다

sentences.original_text: So that other person's land became too dry
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그 다른 사람의 땅이 너무 마르게 되었다
